ValidationRule.description: At least one of the followings fields must be defined: 'Pricing Condition Template', 'Free Item' or 'User Exit'.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( cgcloud__Free_Item__c = false, NOT(ISCHANGED(cgcloud__Free_Item__c)), ISBLANK( cgcloud__Pricing_Condition_Template__c ), LEN(cgcloud__User_Exit__c) = 0, NOT(ISPICKVAL(cgcloud__Reward_Type__c, 'Special')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: At least one of the followings fields must be defined: 'Pricing Condition Template', 'Free Item' or 'User Exit'.
